dc_title_s: Mental Health and Substance Abuse Providers: Washington, District of Columbia
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: SUD and MHRS Provider Contact List
dc_description_s: This layer identifies community-based mental health and substance use service providers. The Department of Behavioral Health ensures that high quality mental health services are available to District residents through a rigorous certification program conducted by the Office of Accountability. DBH certifies a provider to deliver services that support individual recovery with qualified, culturally competent staff in a safe facility. A provider also must comply with local and federal rules and regulations. Only a certified provider is eligible to participate in the District?s public behavioral health system. Services include diagnostic assessment, medication, counseling and community support.
dc_creator_sm: D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO), DC GIS
